mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, hosp_name, org_code, org_name, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from outpt_medical_care_configuration where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into outpt_medical_care_configuration(id, hosp_code, hosp_name, org_code, org_name, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{hospName}, #{orgCode}, #{orgName}, #{remark}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime})

insert into outpt_medical_care_configuration(id, hosp_code, hosp_name, org_code, org_name, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.hospCode}, #{entity.hospName}, #{entity.orgCode}, #{entity.orgName}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.crteId}, #{entity.crteName}, #{entity.crteTime})

insert into outpt_medical_care_configuration(id, hosp_code, hosp_name, org_code, org_name, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.hospCode}, #{entity.hospName}, #{entity.orgCode}, #{entity.orgName}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.crteId}, #{entity.crteName}, #{entity.crteTime})
on duplicate key update id = values(id), hosp_code = values(hosp_code), hosp_name = values(hosp_name), org_code = values(org_code), org_name = values(org_name), remark = values(remark), crte_id = values(crte_id), crte_name = values(crte_name), crte_time = values(crte_time)
mapper.update:
update outpt_medical_care_configuration
id = #{id},
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
hosp_name = #{hospName},
org_code = #{orgCode},
org_name = #{orgName},
remark = #{remark},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_time = #{crteTime},
where id = #{id}
